Package sait.frms.gui

Class ReservationsTab

java.lang.Object
sait.frms.gui.TabBase
sait.frms.gui.ReservationsTab
public class ReservationsTab
extends TabBase
Holds the components for the reservations tab.
Version:
24/03/2021
Author:
Daniel Choi, Alexander Fleury, Liam Zimmerman, Pol-Wung Yung.

    • createInput

      private javax.swing.JPanel createInput​(java.lang.String label, boolean editable)
      Create the input panel used by the createSearchPanel and the createReservePanel methods.
      Parameters:
      label - is the JLabel is the String input from the createSearchPanel and the createReservePanel methods.
      editable - is used to set the associated JTextField to allow user input.
      Returns:
      JPanel that is used by the createReservePanel method.
